title: What is this RIHANNA font?
content:
Is this a font? if so what is it and where to find it unless it is custom-made

author: rosmedia

comments.content:
Avantgarde with a stripe cut out

[Marvin]

yes it loox like Avantgarde...  
but do you think it is just a Illustrator-made design?

_but do you think it is just a Illustrator-made design?_

Probably.
